TileOverlayOptions().Description: Creates a new set of tile overlay options.

writeToParcel(android.os.Parcel, int).FullName: public void writeToParcel (Parcel out, int flags)

Returns: this @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#TileOverlayOptions_E@ object with a new visibility setting.
fadeIn(boolean).Description: Specifies whether the tiles should fade in. The default is true.

Returns: true if the tiles are to fade in; false if it is not.
getFadeIn().Description: Gets whether the tiles should fade in.

Returns: the zIndex of the tile overlay.
getZIndex().Description: Gets the zIndex set for this @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#TileOverlayOptions_E@ object.

Parameters: the @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#TileProvider_E@ to use for this tile overlay.
tileProvider(com.google.android.gms.maps.Description: Specifies the tile provider to use for this tile overlay.

isVisible().Description: Gets the visibility setting for this @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#TileOverlayOptions_E@ object.

Returns: this @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#TileOverlayOptions_E@ object with a new visibility setting.
visible(boolean).Description: Specifies the visibility for the tile overlay. The default visibility is true.

Returns: this @B_com#google#android#gms#maps#model#TileOverlayOptions_E@ object with a new zIndex set.
zIndex(float).Description: Specifies the tile overlay's zIndex, i.e., the order in which it will be drawn where overlays with larger values are drawn above those with lower values. See the documentation at the top of this class for more information about zIndex.
